event.title: 3/7 Tokyo International Friends Party @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya * 3h All-You-Can-Drink * Girls:FREE * 1000å††OFF
event.description:
YES, our parties are happening !!!
IF anybody tells you to go to work, but stay at home otherwise…don’t trust them ğŸ˜‰
F*** the virus, Meet FRIENDS, Celebrate LIFE…the party continues…
-
ä¸‹è¨˜ã®æ—¥æœ¬èªã‚’ã”è¦§ä¸‹ã•ã„ On Saturday, March 7, we invite you to meet lots of international people and make new friends, while enjoying All-You-Can-Drink at LAUREL TOKYO in Shibuya, which has been featured in several TV productions for their unique interior.

1000 Yen OFF with reservation and all details at:
3/6 Intl. Friends Party @ LINE TOKYO http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_friends -
3/7 NEW Intl. Party Shibuya @ LAUREL TOKYO http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=shibuya_friends_party -
Japanese Guys: 2000 Yen
Japanese Girls: 1000 Yen
Foreign Guys: 1000 Yen
Foreign Girls: FREE !!
Birthday Present: FREE Admission, if your birthday is in March.

- Every week, tons of people join Tokyo’s #1 International Party !!
- Make lots of new friends currently staying in this crazy city
- 3 hours All-You-Can-Drink Cocktails, Beer, Wine, Softdrinks etc.
- ’Cause the best night you will never remember ;-)
- Make new Japanese friends and improve your Japanese skills.
- Snacks will also be provided
- Enjoy the atmosphere at this relaxed lounge & bar area.
- Find romance or have great conversation with some cool new people.
- The party is what you make it!!!

3/6 (Fri) Tokyo Intl. Friends Party @ LINE TOKYO Roppongi
20:00~23:30 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/zRZMGAiqVXV25gAa6
Address: Aries Bldg. B1F,[masked] Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_friends

3/7 (Sat) NEW Tokyo International Friends Party @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya
20:00~23:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/DnEzoTkwUAz
Address: SK PLAZA Bldg. B1F,[masked] Dogenzaka, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=shibuya_friends_party

Alone or with friends, everybody is welcome to join the fun.
LIFE is a PARTY… start living it!
